case_circumstances: Decedent was found with obvious blunt force trauma injuries to his head along the Colorado River near Mohave Valley, AZ on 1/4/1985.  He was believed to be a farm worker; however, this has not been verified.  Possibly homeless living/camping along the river.
case_facial_hair: Brown curly mustache; brown/gray beard stubble

case_clothing_on_body: Pair of blue navy socks; pair of blue denim "Private Club" jeans, size 34X30; a green, tan and blue windbreaker style jacket which is a "Sportcaster" brand, extra large; long sleeve J.C. Penny "Quiana" brand, size extra large, navy blue shirt.
case_jewelry: "Bulova" Caravelle watch (note; was one hour behind AZ time)
